entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:51 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: S 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with periods of snow early this morning and with periods of drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
